alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 18 at 2:22PM MDT until July 18 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 MPH with gusts of 40 to 50 MPH. * WHERE...Craters of the Moon, the Arco Desert, Upper Snake Plain, and Beaverhead-Lemhi Highlands, including but not limited to Atomic City, Idaho National Laboratory, Mud Lake, Dubois, Idaho Falls, Ammon, Rigby, Ririe, Rexburg, and St. Anthony. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 8 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust is possible, especially in the Mud Lake area.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Upper Snake River Plain
